content.text: Hello, I'm happy with my life and my health, how are you doing?
Hi, I'm doing well thanks for asking!
Many people want to be my friend, and I write children's books. What about you?
After finishing my career, I discovered that I'm not that passionate about it, what do you do for work?
I'm a paper salesman, and I enjoy it, even though it can be stressful at times.
I clean my glasses when I should be doing other things, what do you do when you're bored?
I go to the lake, it's a beautiful place to relax and clear my head.
That sounds nice, I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I would hope they would be supportive.
I'm glad to hear that you're open about your sexuality, I hope your family is as well.
Thanks, I'm 5'9", and I'm proud of my height!
You should be, it's a great height!
Thanks, I'm glad you think so
